short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Daily Verses From The Holy Bible

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bible Verses Daily is an extension where your new tab is replaced by an encouraging verse from the Holy Bible everyday so that you stay connected with the Word of God as you go online each day. A search box powered by Bing.com enables you to browse the internet right from the extension page.

How to get started:
Bible Verses Daily is a new tab extension which is integrated into Chrome to provide users access to a Bible verse each day along with a Bing.com search bar for your convenience. The new tab extension is easy to use and user-friendly.
It does not store or share any personal information, financial details or authentication permissions.

Features:
A Bible verse daily on your New Tab
Ease of navigation
Search box powered by Bing.com
Clean & seamless user interface 
Completely free to use

Permissions:
It  needs permission to allow new tabs to display the Bible Verses Daily extension with the features including the access to the customised search bar powered by Bing.com. This extension does NOT ask for your login or password. 

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the "Bible Verses Daily" extension and hereby agree to set Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Uninstallation:
To uninstall the extension in Chrome, go to chrome://extensions/ and locate "Bible Verses Daily", click on Remove and you will be prompted with a pop up "Remove Bible Verses Daily?", click the Remove button.

Please refer to our Privacy Policy (https://mediastinct.com/privacy-policy/) and Terms of Use (https://mediastinct.com/terms-conditions/) or contact us at dev@mediastinct.com for any queries.

Disclaimer: Bible Verses Daily is an independent project and functions only as a new tab extension that has been created to ensure that verses from the Holy Bible can be viewed daily at ease. Please, refer to our Privacy Policy for more details on the purpose and methods of our handling user data.
